item.title: THANK YOU FOR CHOOSING EKC. FOR SUPPORT LIKE FACEBOOK.COM/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG- EKC 13.6 HALLOWEEN EDITION PUSHED- BETTER LIVE TV DEFAULT CLICK PUT IN- SEARCH FUNCTION SWITCHED TO A NEW SYSTEM- MOVIES SHORTCUTS CHANGED TO COVENANT (BOB WAS HAVING ISSUES- HD MOVIES STILL,AVAILABLE UNDER MOVIES IN BOB UNLEASHED HD)
DONATIONS ARE ALWAYS VERY APPRECIATED-IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO DONATE YOU CAN AT PAYPAL.ME/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG - YOU CAN PURCHASE PRELOADED DEVICES AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM

EKC HALLOWEEN EDITION HAS BEEN RELEASED. ALOT OF YOU WERE NOT RECIEVING PROMPTS AND THE WIZARD WAS THROWING AN ERROR - TO FIX CLICK DOWN FROM ADDONS INTO PROGRAM ADDONS - CLICK THE BUTTON WITH 3 LINES ON YOUR REMOTE THAN SELECT SETTINGS - CLICK TO THE RIGHT THAN DOWN TO DEFAULT - AFTER THIS GO OVER AND CLICK OK - THAN CLIICK NORMALLY ON EKC WIZARD - EKC WIZARD BUILDS - EKC HALLOWEEN EDITION - FRESH INSTALL - FORCE CLOSE WHEN IT IS DONE - SORRY FOR THE ERROR EVERYONE

PLAYERS KLUB SIGN UP SITE IS ACTIVE AGAIN. COST IS $5 A MONTH AND YOU GET GREAT LIVE TV. SIGN UP AT BIT.LY/PLAYERSIPTV-AFTER YOU MAKE AN ACCOUNT SIMPLY ENTER IN YOUR LOG IN INFO UNDER LIVE TV IN THE PK LOG IN SECTION
IF YOU REQUIRE A VPN, PLEASE VISIT BIT.LY/PRIVACYVPN - EKC PHONE NUMBER WILL BE DISCONTINUED STARTING OCTOBER. CONTACT US VIA OUR FACEBOOK PAGE OR ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG@GMAIL.COM FOR SUPPORT
